channel.title: Connects on Harish Kumar Sadasivam
channel.description: Recent content in Connects on Harish Kumar Sadasivam

item.description:
🔗 Connect #

Thank you for visiting my portfolio! I’m always open to connecting with like-minded professionals, collaborators, and organizations working at the intersection of healthcare and data science. Whether you’re interested in discussing opportunities, sharing insights, or working together on impactful healthcare projects—I’d love to hear from you.

📬 Contact Me #

  • 📧 Email: sadasivamharishkumar@gmail.com
  • 📞 Phone: +1 (972)-654-0333
  • 🌍 Location: Currently based in the United States

🌐 Social Profiles #

  • 💼 LinkedIn
  • 🐙 GitHub
  • 📝 Resume (PDF)

Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn or email. I’m happy to chat about health informatics, data analytics, AI in healthcare, or any innovative idea you have in mind.
